mapper.select: SELECT user_id , user_wd , user_name , phone1 , phone2 , phone3 , email1 , email2 , post , addr1 , addr2 , seller , join_date FROM member WHERE user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT content_no , user_id , title , agency , ps_num , category , write_date , image0 , head , body , image1 , youtube , cl_addr , start_date , end_date , start_time , end_time FROM agency_board WHERE board_condition = 'Y' AND end_date >= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY write_date DESC LIMIT 0, 4

SELECT content_no , user_id , title , agency , ps_num , category , write_date , image0 , head , body , image1 , youtube , cl_addr , start_date , end_date , start_time , end_time FROM agency_board WHERE content_no = #{content_no}

select reserve_no , user_id , content_no , ps_num , class_date , reserve_num , reserve_time FROM reservation WHERE content_no = #{content_no} AND reserve_condition = 'Y'
AND class_date = #{class_date}

select reserve_no , user_id , content_no , ps_num , class_date , reserve_num , reserve_time FROM reservation WHERE content_no = #{content_no} AND user_id = #{user_id} AND class_date = #{class_date} AND reserve_condition = 'Y'
SELECT content_no , user_id , favorite_date , favorite_condition FROM favorite WHERE content_no = #{content_no} AND user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT content_no FROM favorite WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND favorite_condition = 'Y'

SELECT content_no , user_id , title , agency , ps_num , category , write_date , image0 , head , body , image1 , youtube , cl_addr , start_date , end_date , start_time , end_time FROM agency_board WHERE content_no IN (SELECT content_no FROM favorite WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND favorite_condition = 'Y') AND board_condition = 'Y' AND end_date >= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT cr.review_no , cr.reserve_no , cr.user_id , cr.content_no , cr.review_content , cr.review_date , mb.user_id FROM class_review cr JOIN member mb USING(user_id) WHERE content_no = #{content_no} ORDER BY review_date DESC

SELECT br.request_no , br.content_no , br.user_id , br.request_type , br.request_title , br.request_content , br.request_condition , br.request_date , ab.title , ab.start_date , ab.end_date , ab.head FROM board_request br JOIN agency_board ab USING(content_no) WHERE br.content_no IN (SELECT content_no FROM board_request WHERE user_id = #{user_id}) ORDER BY request_date DESC

SELECT content_no , user_id , title , agency , ps_num , category , write_date , image0 , head , body , image1 , youtube , cl_addr , start_date , end_date , start_time , end_time FROM agency_board WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND board_condition = 'Y'
AND end_date >= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND end_date < DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT content_no , user_id , title , agency , ps_num , category , write_date , image0 , head , body , image1 , youtube , cl_addr , start_date , end_date , start_time , end_time FROM agency_board WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query},'%') AND end_date >= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY write_date DESC

SELECT mb.user_name , mb.phone1 , mb.phone2 , mb.phone3 , mb.email1 , mb.email2 , rs.reserve_no , rs.class_date , rs.reserve_num FROM member mb JOIN reservation rs USING (user_id) WHERE mb.user_id in (SELECT user_id FROM reservation WHERE content_no = #{content_no}) AND rs.content_no = #{content_no} AND rs.reserve_condition = 'Y' ORDER BY rs.class_date DESC
